The exceptionally well maintained Haval H2 comes with a powerful 1.5 Turbocharged engine pushing out 105kW of power. The family orientated SUV comes with loads of extras which includes a crystal clear rear view camera, front and rear PDCs, 6 airbags, stability control, tyre pressure monitor, roof racks, rain sensing wipers, cruise control, multi-functioning steering wheel as well as a digital cluster. Other notable feature include keyless entry, push start, electronic handbrake, auto-hold and 18" Alloy Rims. With this beautiful 6-speed manual SUV you get exceptional value for money. Book a test with one of the fast selling SUVs!!

Trade in Welcome. Finance Available.
Certified Roadworthy Pre-owned.
